title: A man who sells a four-year-old son in Craigslist for money to watch apples before they get arranged.
subtitle: :: Rumours: A father tried to sell his little son in Craigslist to finance the purchase of a new apple monitor.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A father tried to sell his little son in Craigslist to finance the purchase of a new apple monitor.
